Posts.Content: bonnieandcleo wrote: Has anyone pins and needles as a result of a tumour eroding the nerves and then pins and needles in finger and thumb 24/7 it drives me mad...I hvae it 6 weeks now and I have started navelbine and avastin over the last 4 weeks. The oncol has put me on neurontin to help but it makes me very tired...I also feel depressed.this is a reacur and it all started in 1984 and a reacur in 2005. please help Ruth Henderson Dx 4/7/2011, 0/6 nodes, ER+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
